projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A fully functional calculator app built by using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.features: Supports basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) with a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: TODO List
projects.description: A simple Powerfull task management application developed using ReactJS.
projects.features: Add, edit, and delete tasks with real-time updates and a clean, user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Ola Clone
projects.description: A visually appealing clone of the Ola webpage designed using HTML and CSS.
projects.features: Static page replicating the layout, design elements, and styling of the original Ola website.
